text: Daniel Goodwin (born November 7, 1955) is an American climber. He is best known for climbing many skyscrapers such as the Sears Tower, the John Hancock Center, the World Trade Center and the CN Tower. ==References== ==Other websites== *BBC news report on climbing of the Sears Tower *Buildering, Climbing Buildings *SkyscraperDefenseAct Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Writers from Maine
title: Dan Goodwin
